channel.title: Dumbo on Gourmand Syndrome
channel.description: Recent content in Dumbo on Gourmand Syndrome

item.title: The River Cafe
item.description: We finally made it to The River Cafe, which was a restaurant we wanted to go for a while. This restaurant sits right next to the East River, right under the Brooklyn Bridge. We made a reservation for a table of 7 at 5 PM on a Friday night. The dinner consists of primarily 3 courses, which has a fixed price of $195. The River Cafe has 1 Michelin Star and first received it in 2010.
